amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section stating the sense of the Congress that the Secretary of Agriculture should use the transfer authority provided by law to implement the strategic plan developed by APHIS for the eradication of Emerald Ash Borer in the States of Michigan, Ohio, and Indiana.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schwarz (MI) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
